dmca.title: piracy content into forum
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal <http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: chaves fernandes [mailto:chavesfernandes@yahoo.com.br] 
Posted At: Sunday, August 20, 2006 6:58 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: piracy content into forum 
Subject: piracy content into forum 


I wish report illegal activities of piracy  of the hacker group cablefreebrasil ,  
hosted into  www.cablefreebrasil.com <http://www.cablefreebrasil.com/>   ,  in this
address hosted by you  there are a forum aim discuss stolen paid tv system  , cable
tv and satellite systems like  directv and sky , trade of devices, diagrams ,
schematics , software and hacker info for intent deliberate illegal stuff  . 
I believe the nature of the forum is Prohibited Content and  constitute violation of
several relevant laws,  beyond  Infringement of Intellectual Property rights of the
companies owner of  encriptation systems ,  companies makers of the decoder boxes ,
of the  TV  signal operators and local retransmiters ,  all these include in the
forum like Tocom, General Intruments, Scientific Atlanta,  DirecTV, Sky , Tecsat , 
Vision, ESPN , HBO ,  etc..
 
 
The login of the forum is "member only"   , but easy to free register and verify the
content , below a copy of the screen topics
 
 
 <http://cablefreebrasil.com/forum/templates/AllSat/images/logo.gif> 
 <http://cablefreebrasil.com/forum/templates/AllSat/images/pub.gif>

A sua
